DOC.brief_summary: Paracervical blockage can reduce severe pain during second trimester induced medical abortion.
DOC.criteria: Women who request second trimester medical abortion (1322 weeks gestation according to ultrasound) 18 years of age or older able to understand and communicate in Swedish able to understand the study related information and willing to give her informed consent to participation in the study Known allergy to bupivakain or related substances
